description: Great tool for analyzing music for learning / transcribing. Big downside is it crashes system occasionally - hard reboot!

All in all my first impression of the program is very, very good. It's well designed and built around solid basic features.

BUT it's not ready to use as it is. You need to install all effects MANUALLY, at least some even via make, from http://www.ladspa.org (Linux Audio Developer's Simple Plugin API), Sweep itself has not a single one pre-installed. AND I had to fiddle around finding a working solution in "Playback:Configure audio device" (for me it was "plughw:1,0").

Next version, please deliver a ready-to-use application, it has really a lot of potential and could SWEEP Audacity sway for many users then!
summary: Has a lot of potential, but ..

description: La opción más útil en Ubuntu a día de hoy, sigue siendo Audacity.
